    • Method Detail

      • play

        public void play(StartCorner startingCorner,
        int bx,
        int by,
        int w1,
        int w2,
        int d1,
        int goalX,
        int goalY)
        Description copied from class: Robot
        Virtual function detailing how the robot will play (must be overwritten)
        Specified by:
        play in class Robot
        Parameters:
        startingCorner - The corner the robot debuts the game
        bx - The coordinate of ball dispenser (in grid tiles, not cm)
        by - Y coordinate of ball dispenser (in grid tiles, not cm)
        w1 - Closer boundary of defensive zone (in grid tiles, not cm)
        w2 - Further boundary of defensive zone (in grid tiles, not cm)
        d1 - Distance from goal (in grid tiles, not cm)
        goalX - Coordinates of the goal (in cm)
        goalY - Coordinates of the goal (in cm)
